topic.title: Multiple Output Documents in XSLT 2.0 and XSLT 3.0

keywords.indexterm: Debugging XSLT/XQuery Documentslayoutmultiple output documents in XSLT 2.0

body.p: For XSLT 2.0 and XSLT 3.0 stylesheets that store the output in more than one file by using the xsl:result-document instruction the content of the file created in this way is displayed dynamically while the transformation is running in an output view. There is one view for each xsl:result-document instruction so that the output is not mixed while still being presented in multiple views.
